summary: Morbid humor lore friendly to Astrid and DB.
descriptionHtml:
A bloody smile smeared onto the victims\' hoods. Somehow I get the feeling Astrid would have done this, or at least someone within the Dark Brotherhood. It feels and looks lore-friendly to their MO.

I made this for myself, and decided to share. Just plop the Data folder into your Skyrim directory. I\'m not sure how to make NMM compatible uploads, but maybe it will work via NMM. If not, just manually install.
author: Goatroach
